attributes.action: take the litter problem in the United Kingdom seriously, bring in real enforcement and real fines, the current system does not work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: compared to many other countries in the world ours is blatently lagging behind when it comes to litter management.  Fortnightly collection and weak enforcement is leading to increased flytipping and dropping of litter.  Token gestures have gone on for too long, if you litter you should pay the price, everyone knows it is illegal so there is no excuse.  In the states there is a fine of nearly £600 for littering, here it is only 10% of this and only when they are caught!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
